title: Sesame Glazed Veggie Stir-Fry
ingredients: Sesame-soy glaze (soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, garlic)
description: A colorful vegetable stir-fry tossed in a sesame-soy glaze, garnished with sesame seeds and green onions.

title: Creamy Butternut Squash Soup
description: A creamy butternut squash soup garnished with coconut cream, pumpkin seeds, and a sprinkle of paprika.

title: Quinoa-Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with a mixture of quinoa, black beans, corn, and diced tomatoes, garnished with fresh parsley.

title: Vibrant Buddha Bowl
description: A colorful Buddha bowl with roasted chickpeas, fresh veggies, quinoa, and tahini dressing.

title: Vegan Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A hearty vegan spaghetti bolognese topped with fresh basil and nutritional yeast.

title: Hearty Grain Bowl with Peanut Sauce
description: A hearty grain bowl featuring wild rice, roasted sweet potatoes, sautéed kale, and crispy tofu drizzled with peanut sauce.
